title: [JIT] Inverse test is singular
body_html:
Operator level test fails:

======================================================================
ERROR: test_inverse (__main__.TestAutogradGenerated)
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/data/users/zdevito/pytorch/test/common.py", line 77, in wrapper
    fn(*args, **kwargs)
  File "test/test_autograd.py", line 3665, in do_test
    check(name)
  File "test/test_autograd.py", line 3587, in check
    check_against_reference(self, create_traced_fn(fn), fn, (self_variable,) + args_variable)
  File "test/test_autograd.py", line 3498, in check_against_reference
    outputs_test = func(*nograd_inputs)
  File "test/test_autograd.py", line 3446, in traced_fn
    return traced(*inputs_tensors)
